name: Bloody Psyche
description:
How to play

The progress bar shows how much you have until you lose.

If it reaches 100% (or 200% depending on your upgrades) it's game over.

You can win by surviving for a certain time.

Upgrades

There are 5 upgrades you can buy:

  • Resistance: Slows down or decreases the progress bar.
  • Rebellion: Increases your clicks; allows to manually decrease the bar.
  • Tenacity: You can use both the space and the mouse button to click.
  • Cleanse: Increases the spawn rate of runes.
  • Absorb: Increases the maximum percentage up to 200.
Tips (Spoilers?)

On the first phase you should focus on Cleanse and Resistance to build enough resources and time.

On the second stage you should try to max Resistance and buy Tenacity. Maybe buy Absorb if you can.

On the third stage you should focus on clicking. If you can't keep up, buy more Rebellion.

Credits

Main Song: Tears from Heaven

Made by: SPURME on Newgrounds
